fields.name: lds_hash
fields.description: SHA-512 digest of participant's last name, DoB, and SSN. See pprl.md for details

fields.name: participant_id
fields.description: Participant's state-specific identifier. Must not be social security number or any personal identifiable information. No rows in the same upload should have the same participant_id and case_id.

fields.name: benefits_end_month
fields.description: The final month when a participant will receive benefits. Leave this field blank if the participant will continue receiving benefits until the next recertification period.

fields.name: recent_benefit_months
fields.description: List of up to the last 3 months that participant received benefits, formatted as yearmonths separated by spaces. Does not include current benefit month. Months do not need to be consecutive. Fewer than 3 months can be entered for newer participants.

fields.name: protect_location
fields.description: Location protection flag for vulnerable individuals. True values indicate that the individual's location must be protected from disclosure to avoid harm to the individual. The field value can be omitted if the risk of harm has not been assessed.
